dict.string: pdf report aggregator
PDF Report Credits
WoundMap Store
You may need to get advice from other clinician, or submit patient information into chart.

Welcome to the WoundMap Store! Here you can purchase additional credits to use for printing or e-mailing your patientâ€™s Clinical Assessment Document. Credits can be purchased in bundles of 5, 10, and 25.

Purchase Report Credits

Purchase credits to share patient data securely. Packages of 5, 10, or 25 credits are available. One credit allows one PDF report to be printed or emailed.
com.mobilehealthware.woundmap.cad.print5.token
Purchase 5 Credits

If you want to print or send a copy via an email attachment of a patients wound care data and wound photos, you will want to purchase this product. The PDF document that is created will be useful for getting consultation from other wound care experts, or for filing in a patients chart.
Each credit may be used to print or securely e-mail a patient's Clinical Assessment Document.

5 PDF report credits to be used to printed or sent as an attachment via email.

Each time you print or e-mail a Clinical Assessment Document your number of credits will go down by one.

com.mobilehealthware.woundmap.team.teamMember
Create a Team
Creating a team allows you to manage patient records on any device, and allows any team members you add to the team to collaborate on patient care.
Your account will be charged a $99 monthly subscription fee.
TeamMemberIAPDesc.html
com.mobilehealthware.woundcare.woundmap.consultGroup.create
Create a WoundMap Consulting Group
Get listed on every WoundMap user's device as a WoundMap Consulting Group.
You will have full read/write access to a patient's record when you accept a consult.
ConsultantGroupIAPDesc.html
